name: Steamed Mussels In Thai Broth
keywords: dairy-free, fall, winter, main course, mussels, sake, seafood
recipeIngredient: 2 stalks lemon grass, trimmed of woody ends and roughly chopped
2 quarts chicken stock or canned chicken broth
1 medium tomato, seeded and cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 kaffir lime leaf or a 2-inch piece of lime zest

recipeInstructions.text: In a large (6-quart) pot over medium-low heat, combine mint, cilantro, basil, lemon grass, shallots, garlic, curry paste and tom yum. Stir until herb leaves wilt, about 5 minutes. Add sake, lemon juice and stock. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to low. Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Strain broth into another large pot. Add mussels, tomato and kaffir lime leaf. Cover, and place over high heat. Cook until mussels open, about 5 minutes. Transfer to serving bowls, and garnish with chopped cilantro, basil and mint. Serve immediately.
